planet.name: Kepler-48 b
KOI 148.01
KID 5735762
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 4.78 days for 2.8412 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
